statement.title: # Content
# Standard Input
statement.content: There are several test cases. Each test case has only one line, which contains a positive integer $n (2 \leq n \leq 10^6)$. There are no blank lines between cases. A line with a single $0$ terminates the input.

statement.title: # Standard Output
statement.content: For each test case, you should output one line, which contains $N(n)$ ---- the number of terms in the Farey sequence $F\_n$.

statement.title: # Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
2 3 4 5 01 3 5 9

statement.title: # Note
statement.content:
The answer may exceed $32$-bit integer. Please use long long int.

The data used in this problem is unofficial data prepared by YellowWall. So any mistake here does not imply mistake in the offcial judge data.
